ABOUT/privacy/lbl: WE DO NOT WANT YOUR DATA
ABOUT/privacy/li1: The only statistics tracked for DuckieTV are the visits to the public github site (by Google Analytics) and the installations in the Chrome Webstore.
ABOUT/privacy/li2: As soon you install DuckieTV it runs locally without sending statistics anywhere. There is no server to connect to, no infrastructure to bring down, and no logging from DuckieTV’s side of anything you do within the app, and there never will be.
ABOUT/privacy/li3: We do not want your money! We do this in our spare time for fun and to make our own lives and that of other’s easier. There is no business model, no ads, no profit.
ABOUT/privacy/li4-1: There are no costs to cover: No servers, no hosting, no databases, everything runs on Google's, GitHub's and Reddit's infrastructure. Therefore you are
ABOUT/privacy/li4-3: the product and this is extension is free as in free beer.
ABOUT/privacy/li5: Everything runs locally. If you decide to execute a torrent search for an episode, a request goes from your computer to the search engine.
ABOUT/tvinfo-tvdbwiki/link: please visit their Wiki Page and help them correct it
ABOUT/tvinfo/p1: DuckieTV makes extensive use of the base database built by
ABOUT/tvinfo/p2: . If you find incorrect information about shows
BACKUPCTRLjs/wipe/desc: Do you really want to remove all series and episodes from the DuckieTV database and clear all the settings?
GOOGLEIMAGESjs/placeholder: Search IMDB for movies or series
IMDBjs/placeholder: Search IMDB for movies or series
QUERYMONITOR/please-wait/lbl: Please don't close DuckieTV until this is done
QUERYMONITORjs/close-tab-prompt/lbl: DuckieTV is still performing database operations. Do you really want to close this tab?

SERIESLIST/FAVORITES/click-to-see/lbl: Your favorite series. Click one to view details
SERIESLIST/SEARCHRESULTS/click-to-see/lb: Your favorite series. Click one to view details
SERIESLIST/TOOLS/ADDING/addshow-protip/l: Pro Tip: Hit [return] to add the first search result to your favorites
SERIESLIST/TOOLS/ADDING/addshow-return-t: Click to return to your favorites list
SERIESLIST/TOOLS/ADDING/addshow-start-ty: Start typing to search for shows to add to your favorites list
SERIESLIST/TOOLS/ADDING/addshow-type-ser: Start typing to manually search for a show
SERIESLIST/TOOLS/FAVORITES/addshow-add-t: Add series to your favorites list
SERIESLIST/TOOLS/LOCALFILTER/addshow-ret: Click to return to your favorites list
SERIESLIST/TRAKT-SEARCHING/connect-to-tr: Connect DuckieTV to your Trakt.tv account
SERIESLIST/TRAKT-SEARCHING/error-with-tr: There was an error contacting Trakt.TV, it might be down. Please try again later.
SERIESLIST/TRAKT-SEARCHING/import/btn: You can also import a backup
SERIESLIST/TRAKT-SEARCHING/series-no/des:
Make DuckieTV work for you by adding the TV shows you like. Shows that are currently airing will appear on the calendar so that you can easily keep track of what is airing when.
 Just click on any of the trending shows below to add them or start typing above to manually search for a show
SERIESLIST/TRAKT-TRENDING/addtrending-he: Click a show to add it to your favorites
Please wait while loading Trakt.TV's Trending TV-Shows list
SERIESLIST/TRAKT-TRENDING/connect-to-tra: Connect DuckieTV to your Trakt.tv account
SERIESLIST/TRAKT-TRENDING/import/btn: You can also import a backup
SERIESLIST/TRAKT-TRENDING/series-no/desc:
Make DuckieTV work for you by adding the TV shows you like. Shows that are currently airing will appear on the calendar so that you can easily keep track of what is airing when.
 Just click on any of the trending shows below to add them or start typing above to manually search for a show
SERIESLISTjs/category/list: Action,Adventure,Animation,Children,Comedy,Crime,Disaster,Documentary,Drama,Eastern,Family,Fan Film,Fantasy,Film Noir,Food,Game Show,History,Holiday,Home and Garden,Horror,Indie,Mini Series,Music,Musical,Mystery,News,None,Reality,Road,Romance,Science Fiction,Short,Soap,Special Interest,Sport,Suspense,Talk Show,Thriller,Travel,TV Movie,War,Western
SETTINGS/BACKUP/desc: Create a backup of your series / episodes / watched list.
SETTINGS/BACKUP/refresh/desc: Fetch fresh data for all series in your favorites list. This will take some time!
SETTINGS/BACKUP/wipe/desc: Remove all series and episodes from the DuckieTV database. Clear all settings and start completely fresh.
SETTINGS/CALENDAR/downloaded/desc: Choose whether to highlight in green the downloaded episodes within the calendar
SETTINGS/CALENDAR/mode/desc: If you prefer the calendar to show only the current week/month, change it here
SETTINGS/CALENDAR/specials/desc: Choose to show or hide all the special episodes from the calendar
SETTINGS/CALENDAR/start/desc: Toggle between Sunday/Monday for start day of the week below
SETTINGS/DEFAULT/sync-doit/btn: Keep series in sync between browsers
SETTINGS/DEFAULT/sync-doit/desc: Clicking this button will keep your series in sync with other browsers
SETTINGS/DEFAULT/sync-dont/desc: Clicking this button will stop syncing your local series list with other browsers
SETTINGS/DEFAULT/sync-push/desc:
If you have used the Browser settings 'Sign in' to login to your Google Account,
 then hit this button to push your current series list into the cloud.
 Sign in on another browser with the same Google account and your series list will auto-magically be synced.
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/background-opacity/aler: Selecting a button below will set the background image transparency to the chosen percentage.
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/background-opacity/desc: Change the slider below to select a background overlay opacity. A higher value means a lighter background image.
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/download-ratings/desc: Choose whether Series and Episodes Ratings are downloaded and displayed.
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/locale/alert: Select one of the following Locales to override the default.
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/topsites-hide/desc: Clicking the button will hide the list of your most visited sites from the new tab page
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/topsites-mode-click/btn: Require click to open Top Sites
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/topsites-mode-click/des: Clicking the button below will make the Top Sites bar open when you click on it
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/topsites-mode-hover/btn: Require hover to open Top Sites
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/topsites-mode-hover/des: Clicking the button below will make the Top Sites bar open when you hover over it
SETTINGS/DISPLAY/topsites-show/desc: Clicking the button will show a list of your 12 most visited sites on the new tab page
SETTINGS/LANGUAGE/desc: Translate DuckieTV into your local language and date/time formats by changing the setting below
SETTINGS/LANGUAGE/desc2: Note that most of the translations are auto-translated. We are still
SETTINGS/TORRENT-SEARCH/default-provider: Change your preferred torrent search provider below
SETTINGS/TORRENT-SEARCH/kat-find-mirror/: Find a random mirror that supports Magnet links
SETTINGS/TORRENT-SEARCH/kat/desc: If for some reason Kickass Torrents is blocked in your territory, use the button below to automatically resolve a working mirror that supports magnet links. If you have a preferred server, you may input that as well.
SETTINGS/TORRENT-SEARCH/quality-select/d: If you select '720p' this will append '720p' to the default [seriesname] S[seasonnumber]E[episodenumber] search string.
This does not work as a 'minimum quality' search!
SETTINGS/TORRENT-SEARCH/quality/desc: Make a choice below to limit your episode searches to a specific quality.
SETTINGS/TORRENT-SEARCH/tpb-find-mirror/: Find a random mirror that supports Magnet links
SETTINGS/TORRENT-SEARCH/tpb/desc: If for some reason ThePirateBay is blocked in your territory, use the button below to automatically resolve a working mirror that supports magnet links. If you have a preferred server, you may input that as well.
SETTINGS/TORRENT-SEARCH/unsafe-proxies-d: Enabling this setting will allow you to use Torrent Proxies that proxy your magnet links (Which DuckieTV prevents by default to protect your privacy)
SETTINGS/TORRENT/autodownload-disable/bt: Disable auto-downloading torrents for aired shows
SETTINGS/TORRENT/autodownload-disable/de: Clicking the button below stops the auto-download process for torrents on your calendar.
SETTINGS/TORRENT/autodownload-enable/btn: Enable auto-downloading torrents for aired shows
SETTINGS/TORRENT/autodownload-enable/des: Clicking the button below starts an automatic check every 2 hours that downloads torrents for episodes that have aired within

days (and haven't been already downloaded or marked as watched).
 It makes sure there are at least
seeders for the torrent and automatically uses your torrent quality preference.
SETTINGS/TORRENT/autodownload-period/des: Automatically try to find a download for shows that aired in the last
days. Increase this value if you don't use DuckieTV every day.
SETTINGS/TORRENT/autodownload-seeders/de: Changes the amount of seeders required for an episode before it starts to download it.
SETTINGS/TORRENT/autostop-disabled/desc: Clicking the button below requires you to click stop to end seeding finished torrents
SETTINGS/TORRENT/autostop-enabled/desc: Clicking the button below automatically stops the torrent when it reaches 100%
SETTINGS/TORRENT/functions-hide/desc: Clicking the button below will hide all torrent related functionalities throughout the app
SETTINGS/TORRENT/functions-show/desc: Clicking the button below enables all torrent related functionalities throughout the app
SETTINGS/TORRENT/progressbar-hide/desc: Clicking the button below removes the progress bar that appears on an episode in the calender while downloading
SETTINGS/TORRENT/progressbar-show/desc: Clicking the button below adds a progress bar that appears on an episode in the calender while downloading
SETTINGS/TRAKT-IMPORT/desc: You can import all shows and watched episodes from your Trakt.TV account into DuckieTV using the button below
SETTINGS/TRAKT-IMPORT/suggestions-fetche: Fetched Suggestions from Trakt.TV based on series your Trakt.TV profile:
SETTINGS/TRAKT-IMPORT/suggestions/lbl: Trakt.TV can also provide TV-Show suggestions based on shows you added to your profile. You can fetch them here
SETTINGS/TRAKT-IMPORT/sync/desc:
If you have a Trakt.TV account, you can have DuckieTV automatically fill itself by passing your credentials below.
 All your favorite shows and watched episodes will be fetched and added to your favorites list.

 If you enable Trakt.TV Sync all shows that you add and episodes that you mark watched in DuckieTV will automatically synced to your Trakt.TV account.
SETTINGS/TRAKT-IMPORT/watched-sync/desc: DuckieTV can automatically push your watched episodes to Trakt.TV now that you are authenticated. Toggle the integration below
SETTINGS/UTORRENT/directory-folder-hide/: Clicking the button below removes the 'open containing folder' button from the menu in the calendar if you selected a torrent for the show
SETTINGS/UTORRENT/directory-folder-show/: Clicking the button below adds the 'open containing folder' button to the menu in the calendar if you selected a torrent for the show
SETTINGS/UTORRENT/is-authenticated/desc: DuckieTV is currently connected to µTorrent using token
SETTINGS/UTORRENT/is-authenticated/desc2: You can revoke DuckieTV's access by clicking the button below.
SETTINGS/UTORRENT/is-not-authenticated/d: DuckieTV is not currently connected to µTorrent. Click the button below and accept the µTorrent access request that pops up to integrate DuckieTV with µTorrent.
SETTINGS/UTORRENT/streaming-disabled/des: Clicking the button below disables the streaming option while downloading torrents
SETTINGS/UTORRENT/streaming-enabled/desc: Clicking the button below enables the streaming option while downloading torrents
SIDEPANELEPISODECTRLjs/please-login-netf: You are not logged in to Netflix. Please login, then you can close the window, and press this button again
SIDEPANELSERIECTRLjs/serie-delete-questi: Do you really want to delete
STORAGESYNCSERVICEjs/serie-deleted-remot: ' was deleted on another computer you're logged in on. Do you want to delete it here as well? (If you select no, it will be re-added to the remote computer on next sync)
TORRENTCLIENT/desc/p1: You need to be running μTorrent (Windows) v3.3.x or
TORRENTCLIENT/desc/p3: You can now control your torrents straight from DuckieTV. Make sure μTorrent is running and accept the Pair request to enable auto-magic integration throughout the app
